instruction.value: Administer over 5 minutes by direct injection. May repeat dose every 5 to 10 minutes as required, to a MAXIMUM total loading dose of 15 mg/kg.
Administer daily calculated dose in 6 equally divided doses.
Administer daily calculated dose in 4 equally divided doses.
Administer until arrhythmia is controlled, hypotension occurs, QRS complex widens by 50% of original width or a total dose of 17 mg/kg is administered.
Administer every 5 minutes until arrhythmia is controlled, hypotension occurs, QRS complex widens by 50% of original width or a total dose of 17 mg/kg is administered.

AdditionalNotes.value: Premature neonates should receive the lowest dose.
Stop infusion if hypotension occurs or if QRS complex widens by more than 50% of baseline.
